22-016TI.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes from the Technology & Innovation Commission meeting held Wednesday, May 18, 2022.This agenda item was approved.Yes: 5 - Lisa Mae Brunson, Justin Hectus, Parisa Vinzant, Gwen Shaffer and Robb Korinke2.

22-017TI.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the completed Technology & Innovation Commission white paper titled "Analysis and recommendations for regulating facial recognition technology and other "smart" devices and platforms", and the Equity and Human Relations Commission recommendations related to the City's use of Facial Recognition Technology, and to discuss next steps for distribution and outreach for both documents.
